content: tit wings patt working row 1 to 6 in cloud grey and row 7 to 14 in pale yellow spring delight wreath copyright © 2024 amanda berry page 13 of 15 nest row 1 rs k2tog k1 lift the 2nd stitch on the rh needle over the 1st 4 times knit to end 3 sts nest row 2 ws purl make 1 per nest row 3 cast on 5 sts at start of row then repeat row 1 cast on 50 sts using 3 sts 3 25mm single pointed row 4 purl needles and woody brown yarn start at the top row 5 cast on 5 sts at start of row k2tog k1 lift edge the 2nd stitch on the rh needle over the 1st 6 row 1 to 9 knit times 1 stitch row 10 rs k1 k2tog k4 8 times k1 42 sts pull through to cast off row 11 and all foll ws odd-numbered row knit row 12 k1 k2tog k3 8 times k1 34 sts stem row 14 k1 k2tog k2 8 times k1 26 sts with the rs of the petals facing you and using a row 16 k1 k2tog k1 8 times k1 18 sts 3 25mm dpn and pale green yarn pick up and knit 3 sts in the middle of the straight side edge 3 sts row 18 k2tog 9 times 9 sts holding the piece with the rs facing you with pale pull through to cast off green yarn and two 3 25mm dpns work i-cord on the 3 sts for 13 row making up sew side edges decrease and weave in yarn cast off all sts tails on the inside ws making up for each flower with the rs facing you use the cast on tail to overcast to seam the first 2 snowdrops sts of the cast on/off edges decrease and weave in the tail on the inside weave in all other yarn tails on snowdrops the inside trimming one pale green yarn tail inside make 1 per flower cast on 8 sts using the flower as the inner petal 3 25mm single pointed needles and pale cream yarn start at the side edge spring delight wreath copyright © 2024 amanda berry page 14 of 15 spring delight wreath copyright © 2024 amanda berry page 15 of 15
